name: Small Aircraft
description:
This is a classic flying shooting game with exquisite and simple graphics. The overall environment mainly revolves around battles, with a plethora of enemies, presenting players with a different shooting experience. Simple operation: Rotate the mouse to turn left and right, and click the left mouse button to attack the enemy. But you have nowhere to hide.

Heroes cannot evade! You need to eliminate the enemy forces that are constantly advancing towards you in order to maintain survival!

Game features:

This game has inherited classic flying shooting elements.

Easy to get started, continuous micro operation; Quick reaction, while exercising brain cells in joy.

A simple and elegant fighter jet, like the arrival of reality.

Exercise your combat skills and improve your scores
